NVIDIA/NeMo-text-processing

Python package for text normalization and inverse text normalization

Related repos

  • toolkit for building and optimizing AI agent workflows
  • Extracts text from images and PDFs using vision models through Ollama, available as Python package and web app
  • Extracts document content for generative applications
  • Unified benchmark for scene text detection and recognition
  • Text editor built with PyQt6 and Python
  • GUI for batch processing text files with Ollama
  • face recognition and analysis in python
  • NVIDIA Isaac GR00T lets robots use language and images to do tasks in different environments
